title: Bitcoin miners Hut 8, USBTC prepares for halving with merger into new company
description:
Hut 8 Mining Corp., a North American Bitcoin (BTC) miner, said it has finalized a merger with US Bitcoin Corp (USBTC) and is rebranding to a U.S.-based entity that would be known as Hut 8 Corp (New Hut), according to a Nov. 30 statement. The firm stated: “We are now officially operating as a U.S.-domiciled […]

The post Bitcoin miners Hut 8, USBTC prepares for halving with merger into new company appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: United Nations agency to organize blockchain technology training
description: The United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) is poised to elevate the skills of its 22,000 staff members through a comprehensive blockchain technology training initiative. Teaming up with the Algorand Foundation, the United Nations Development Programme plans to inaugurate a blockchain academy by 2024. title: Interpol’s Biometric Hub Leads to First Border Arrest
description: In a groundbreaking development, European law enforcement has successfully apprehended a fugitive migrant using Interpol’s Biometric Hub—a powerful tool that leverages biometric data for identifying suspects. title: Altcoins Grow as Social Attention Moves Away From BTC
